Hello!

Project 1

Easy Road

2016•View Project

This is some of the process work for the Travel App, 'Easy Road'. This project is trying to address the need for a high level decision making solution to help people discover new travel locations by leveraging user reviews from other travelers and collating and representing them in an easy to read format. The process included user interviews, infinity maps, cardsorting, competitve audit, paper prototypes, lofi and hifi wireframes, prototyping and user testing.

// UX design

Project 2

Newfi

2016•View Project

This is a redesign of for a startup mortgage and refinance company. They needed a site which better communicated what they had to offer in a clear and professional way. I was responsible for creating the UI/UX.

Skillset

In terms of aptitude, I am a Designer first, and Developer second. I love the intersection of design and devopment, and the process of bringing static mockups to life.

Frameworks and Software

I am comfortable with the main design software applications, such as Sketch, Invision, Photoshop, & Illustrator. For Development, I am familiar with Git, Bootstrap, Wordpress, & Jekyll. I am obviously very familar with HTML, CSS, SCSS, and some jQuery.
